meanings.definition: Not trodden upon or walked on
meanings.sent1: The untrodden path through the forest was covered in fallen leaves.
meanings.sent2: The hiker chose the untrodden trail to avoid the crowds.
meanings.sent3: The untrodden snow looked like a blank canvas waiting to be painted.
meanings.sent4: Her untrodden dreams led her to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The untrodden field stretched out before us, untouched and serene.

meanings.sent1: The untrodden wilderness held many mysteries waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent2: The explorer set out to map the untrodden lands beyond the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The untrodden territory on the map seemed both exciting and daunting.
meanings.sent4: His untrodden path to success was filled with challenges and rewards.
meanings.sent5: The untrodden caves hid ancient secrets beneath their unexplored depths.
